Wendy's dainty hand, now the size of a car, trapped most of Cartman's body between its fingers without the slightest kindness.
"AAAAH ! Stan ! Tell your mega cow to let me go !" wailed Cartman at full voice, despite his lungs being squeezed.
"Screw you, Cartman. Butters, help me get Kyle under control." said Stan.
"You got it !" perked Butters, completely ignoring the fat child.
"HEY ! Don't ignore me ! RESPECT MY AUTHORITAH !" howled Cartman, before the giant hand brought him up and up. He waited until he was at the top to slowly turn around, and witness Wendy's huge face. And the crimson hue it sported signaled that she was NOT happy. Murderous was more like it. "Ah, nuts."
"Alright, you little fatso-"
"BIG-BONED !"
"-you have ten seconds to get me back to my normal size !" demanded Wendy, her sugary breath almost blowing Cartman's cap away.
"Hmmmmmmmmmmmmm... nah." shrugged Cartman.
"WHAT ?!" thundered Wendy, squeezing the boy harder.
"Air... Give me air, you... fat... biiiiiii..."
"Maybe I didn't make myself clear, you tiny piece of shit. I will seriously wail on your putrid little flesh, until it's blue, then purple, then a red little F***ING MESS ! You think the fight we had before was bad ? I could snap your neck with my index and thumb right now ! Eat you ! Sit on you ! Punt you all the way to Mexico ! You are DEAD if you don't change me back, you hear me ?! YOU ARE DEAD !" boomed Wendy with unrestrained rage, that even got Cartman almost pissing his pants.
"Oh man, I-I've never seen Wendy this angry before." trembled Butters, Chicken-Kyle sleeping in his hands.
"I... think I did once. Kyle told me. It was when..." Stan reminisced of a certain substitute teacher, Wendy's green-eyed reaction, and her retaliation. At that last part, Stan became horrified. "Dude ! I have to get up there, or she's seriously going to kill Cartman !"
"And... that's bad. Right ?" asked Butters, honestly not sure.
"Yeah ! I mean, Cartman sucks and all, but Wendy's gonna have to live with murder on her conscience ! Um, another one !"
"But didn't she already crush people in our school ?"
"We don't know their names, dude, they'll be back before you know it." rationalised Stan.
"Oh, that makes sense ! I guess..."
"I'm coming Wendy !" shouted Stan, unheard by the 50 foot girl, as she kept on threatening Cartman, while the fat boy kept alternating between bargaining, pleading, and insulting her further out of habit. Stan saw the challenge ahead of him : climbing the body of his ginormous underwear-clad girlfriend. Difficult, but also a really, really awkward for future discussions. "Ah geez, why does every day has to be so weird around here ?"
Stan began his climbing, first up her foot, then her leg, and then he came to the underwear blockade. Deciding this was just that little bit too awkward, Stan jumped from her body to her long black hair, and pursued his ascent. He'd pause to, um, admire the beautiful, dazzling, peach-skinned scenery, and was really grateful he didn't throw up anymore. A couple minutes later, he reached Wendy's shoulder.
"...SAY IT ! SAY YOU'RE A FAT LITTLE CANCER ! SAY IT !!!" Wendy pratically foamed at the mouth.
"Hate you... so much..." wheezed Cartman, his face getting to a lovely shade of purple.
"WENDY !" Stan shouted as loud as he could. Wendy was able to hear him, and spotted her tiny boyfriend. The mere sight of him made her pause in her wrath.
"S...Stan ?" she asked softly, almost woozily.
"Wendy, I know Cartman's a moron, and it's all his fault. And he deserves more than a kick in the nuts for what he did to you."
"Haaate... So muuuuch..."
"But he isn't worth killing ! Not by you. I know you're better than that."
"But just look at me ! He made me a freak ! And half-naked for all the town to see ! And what I did to the school, I... I..." she hyperventilated, all of her cool demanor gone. Now her voice was torn between shameful embarassement, and unbridled rage for the boy in her hand.
"It's gonna be alright, Wendy. We fixed WAY weirder shit before, and we can do it again. I bet even Kenny will help !"
"But he's dead !"
"Yeah, he does that." Stan shrugged casually. Wendy's stance began to waver, her pressure on Cartman starting to ease up. Stan knew it was time to go for the kill, putting a hand on her neck." Please, Wendy ? I trust you."
"I..." began Wendy. "I..."

15422.content:
Rather than go the traditional route of splitting up and getting picked off one by one by an insane axe murdering crazyman the boys decide to remain in one group and begin to look around the ground floor of the house. It's obvious from the high ceilings and large doorways that this place was once worth a considerable amount and no doubt home to some wealthy people. Those days are long gone now though, it seems run down and the furniture has been removed although some of the fixtures remain especially in the kitchen.

"Wow, whoever owned this pad must have been loaded." Cartman observes. "Mmpphhh mmmmpphhhh?" Said Kenny. "No, I don't think this was one of the houses that all those rich people lived in when they moved here. I don't remember any of them being on this side of town." Stan said wondering WTF this mysterious mansion came from anyway.

The group roam around the ground floor of the spooky deserted house until suddenly something happened which was...
15422.title: Odd. No man in a mask.

15423.content:
Rather than split up so as to make an easier target for any possibly local serial killers the boys quite sensibly decided to stay together and headed upstairs to take a look at the rest of the house. When they get up the staircase there really isn't much to look at, it's dark run down and the odd shaft of light breaks in from a boarded up broken window. So not that different from a typical best western then?

The boys notice there are corridors leading off in different directions around this floor of the house, they turn left and head down the corridor then stop to look at the various doors. Do they go into one of the doors or does something else happen?

1543.content:
Professor Frink was in the lab located in the basement of his house in Springfield. The scientist was working on a new invention of his a Transformation Ray. Previously he'd been unable to get a small enough portable power source but now he had solved that problem with a miniature forced singularity power source. Frink finished tinkering with the ray gun and then examined it.

"Well buyhay. It seems I've completed my most exiting project with the transformation and the metamorphosis and the changing glavin!" Frink said in his characteristic way. "Now I wonder where I should test this device. After all if I test it in Springfield it could cause the townspeople to turn against me. I need some place that's remote, full of idiots and no one cares about. Hmm.." Frink takes out a map of Springfield and some other states and after some time studying it he yells. "Of course! Buyhay. I'll just test it in South Park Colarado. Which looks a little bit to much like Wyoming but enough of this. To the Frink mobile!" Frink says then runs up the stairs gets into a battered old town car and drives off down the street with the exhaust making backfiring noises.

Frink drives to the local airport gets on a plane and fly’s to Colarado where he rents a car and drives to South Park. Frink arrives and as he is walking around town he spots a perfect target for him to TF and that would be...

info.brief_description: Cartman, Kyle, Stan, Kenny, and the rest go through a body-changing experience.
info.description:
South Park is copyrighted by Trey Parker and Matt Stone.

This a story is a haven where you can transform and have fun with South Park characters however you wish, but I will have to ask some things:

1: Please do not kill people unless it's either Kenny since he usually dies and comes back or if it's just some random people.

2: These are my rules for censorship. Please do not write about anything too sexual; lighter affectionate scenes are okay (I will choose if it's appropriate). Swear words and rough pieces of dialogue can only be used to match the dialogue of the actual show and cannot be used as a message of hate. I think there can be some sort of tell of which words I will ignore, censor, or delete.

3: Please make your additional chapters have something to do with the story plot and previous chapter.

4. If you have anything to say to me, just e-mail me! Don't sue, whine, or anything like that!

5. Please try your best on grammar, spelling, punctuation, etc. I'm not asking you to be fancy; I just want your input to be legible.

Okay, I'm done. Go nuts. Enjoy this, have fun, and please update, comment, rate, that kind of stuff.
